courses.title: Arabic Language Fundamentals
courses.description: Lay a solid foundation in Arabic grammar, vocabulary, and pronunciation with our beginner-friendly course. Unlock the keys to conversational fluency and written proficiency.

courses.title: Arabic for Daily Life
courses.description: Learn practical Arabic skills for everyday communication, including greetings, expressions, and essential phrases. Build confidence in social interactions and cultural encounters

courses.title: Tajweed: Quranic Recitation
courses.description: Perfect your Quranic recitation with precise pronunciation, intonation, and rhythm. Learn the rules of Tajweed and deepen your connection to the sacred text.

courses.title: Arabic Conversation Practice
courses.description: Enhance your speaking skills and fluency through interactive conversation practice sessions. Engage in meaningful dialogues on a variety of topics to broaden your linguistic proficiency.

courses.title: Quran Nazira
courses.description: Study the Quran with a focus on recitation and memorization (Nazira). Learn to read the Quran fluently with proper pronunciation and memorize selected verses to deepen your connection to the divine text.
